stone.util

Class OptionContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • stone.util.OptionContainer

  • public class OptionContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    A global visible container holding all available options.
    Author:
    Nelphindal

      OptionContainer(Flag flags, Main main)
      Creates a new option container.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptionContainer

        public OptionContainer(Flag flags,
                       Main main)
        Creates a new option container. All options will be backed up to given flags.
        Parameters:
        flags - instance of @{link Flag} to synchronize to
        main - instance of @{link Main} to synchronize to

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public final void addOption(java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String tooltip,
                            char shortFlag,
                            java.lang.String longFlag,
                            boolean argExpected,
                            Option option)
        Registers a option
        Parameters:
        id - a unique id for this option
        tooltip - a description to be printed in the help message
        shortFlag - a unique printable char to register at flags or Flag.NoShortFlag to enable this option
        longFlag - a unique printable string to register at flags or Flag.NoLongFlag to enable this option
        argExpected - passed to Flag to specify if this option consists of a key-value-pair
        option - the Option to be registered
        See Also:
        Flag.registerOption(String, String, char, String, boolean)

      • copyValues

        public final void copyValues(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> values)
        Copies given values into the values registered at this container.
        Parameters:
        values - map containing key-value-pairs for setting underlying flags

      • setValuesByParsedFlags

        public final void setValuesByParsedFlags()
        Sets the value of registered options matching the value of registered options
